mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1870 April 30
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, April 30, 1870. Mount Vernon. Discusses $200 needed for repairs on Peale painting. Adverse opinions on painting. Gate receipts less than this time last year, labor costs higher. Milwaukee Masons send design for marble front to Tomb. Difficulties in appointing Vice Regent for Connecticut.
